summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3158 for the improvement of the Alley in Block 16, University Park Addition, being the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38579, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
